rules_text:
{T}: Add {G}. You lose 1 life unless you control a green permanent.
{1}: Put a wish counter on Promising Hillside.
{T}, Remove a wish counter from Promising Hillside: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: [i]The Tensu explorers were puzzled to find that the clearing seemed to disappear from certain angles, a vibrant new space bleeding through.[/i]
